author: Tish23333
title: Castle Wiki
text:
Welcome Castle User to the Castle Wiki! 
We are currently editing over 2,511 articles , 9,696 pages , 2,378 files , and 10,075,906 users . The Castle Wiki welcomes you to the collaborative project that anyone can edit, dedicated to Castle , the hit ABC television series. This English wiki is the community and source for all Castle fans out there. Castle Wiki was founded on April 23, 2009 by Daboss and its current Admins are Daboss and Christy32 . This wiki was founded in the United States, uses U.S. English and operative by USA laws. 
We created a new facebook page called Castle TV Fans https://www.facebook.com/castletvfans If you're new or old user (for awhile) to this wiki, please look at our working site policies and Community Messages but editing or creating. Also, an image from here that are being taken other sites or wiki must link back here. Disclaimer : The Castle wiki are not connected to (or associated with) ABC or ABC Studios. We have no contact with creator, writers or directors of Castle.
